title: Luboš Přibyl
text: Luboš Přibyl (born 16 October 1964) is a <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> former <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>. He played in the <a href="Czechoslovak%20First%20League">Czechoslovak First League</a> and later the <a href="Gambrinus%20liga">Gambrinus liga</a>, making 348 top-flight appearances in total.
